name: OP Command
description:
A game to test your will and your retinas. Will you resist the never ending waves of missiles or will you let the rain and colours take away the blinding patterns. A game inspired by missile command and the paintings of Bridget Riley.

Controls

Left/Right Click - Fire Counter Missiles from Pyramids

Escape - Back to Main Menu

Credits

Music 

"Dreams Become Real" by Kevin Macleod

Sound

Explosion- cydon

Droplet - Kastenfrosch

Rain- jmbphiles
